mapper.select: select code, name, parent_code, sort_num, memo, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user from c_type_info where code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select code, name, parent_code, sort_num, memo, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user from c_type_info

select code, name, parent_code, sort_num, memo, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user from c_type_info
where ${value}
